uk.ac.reading.dy007252.marcelFevrier.buildingconsole

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.reading.dy007252.marcelFevrier.buildingconsole.Person

  • public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
    The Person class is used to create a Person object which will be used as an occupant of the building
    Author:
    fevri

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Person() 
      Person(int x, int y)
      This constructor can create a person and set their position using two integers which are converted into a point object.
      Person(java.awt.Point p)
      This constructor creates a person and sets their position using a Point object as an input.

        public Person(java.awt.Point p)
        This constructor creates a person and sets their position using a Point object as an input.
        Parameters:
        p - a Point object containing the x and y coordinates for the person's position.

      • movePerson

        public boolean movePerson(java.awt.Point destination)
        Moves the person to a given destination rather than to a list of destinations
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination where the person will move toward one step at a time
        Returns:
        a boolean showing if the person is at the location of the door or not
